events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position with enthusiasm and look forward to reviewing your qualifications in detail.
The application has been categorised under Engineering based on your experience and keywords present in your resume.
A recruiter with expertise in software development roles has been assigned to manage your application moving forward.
Your initial screening call went well, and the interviewer was impressed with your experience in software architecture and coding skills.
You responded promptly to the interview invitation, confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview.
The technical interview has been scheduled for September 10th at 10 AM UTC, focusing on system design and coding problems.
You successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong problem-solving ability and deep understanding of software engineering principles.
Following the technical round, your HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and compensation expectations.
You completed the HR interview positively, sharing your motivations and alignment with the company's values.
An official job offer has been proposed, including salary details, benefits, and expected start date for your review.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm to join the engineering team.
You officially accepted the job offer, confirming your commitment to start work as a software engineer.
The onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions and setup to welcome you to the engineering department.
The recruitment for the software engineer position is now closed with your successful hiring and onboarding completed.
